gw.bizrules.util

Class BizRulesLookupMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.bizrules.util.BizRulesLookupMethods

  • public class BizRulesLookupMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for Lookup expression which we can used in expression fragment to evaluate expressions.

      • doLookup

        public static java.lang.Object doLookup(java.lang.String tableID,
                                        java.lang.String[] inputIDs,
                                        java.lang.String[] inputTypes,
                                        java.lang.String outputID,
                                        java.lang.String outputType,
                                        java.lang.Object[] inputValues)
        Executes the lookup function for the give inputs and return the lookup output value
        Parameters:
        tableID - lookup table or function ID
        inputIDs - lookup input ids
        inputTypes - lookup input data types
        outputID - lookup output name
        outputType - lookup output return type
        inputValues - lookup input values
        Returns:
        lookup output

      • activeRulesUsingLookup

        public static java.util.List<Rule> activeRulesUsingLookup(java.lang.String tableID)
        Returns active rules using a specific lookup. If deployment is enabled, this will include the latest deployed ruleversion which use the lookup. If deployment is disabled, this will include the tip rule version.
        Parameters:
        tableID - Lookup Table ID
        Returns:
        List of rules using the lookup

      • latestDeployedOrHeadVersionUsingLookup

        public static java.util.List<Rule> latestDeployedOrHeadVersionUsingLookup(java.lang.String tableID)
        If deployment is enabled, this will include the latest deployed or tip rule versions which use the lookup. If deployment is disabled, this will include the tip rule version. In both cases, only return rules available to run.
        Parameters:
        tableID -
        Returns:
        List of rules using the lookup

        public static java.util.Optional<LookupMetadata> getLookupMetadata(java.lang.String idTable)
